mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Alice A. Carr( now Shockey)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Alice A. Carr( now Shockey) John C. Hall, Guardian until 09.12.1881 when he resigned John H. Shockey, became guardian 09.12.1881 when he married Alice A. Carr and John C. Hall resigned Recorded in Ledger Book 2, page 168, in Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
